room_title: Escape room "Queen City Bank Heist" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: The team had such a great time this evening at Exit Strategy solving Bank Heist! It is definitely team building - we all worked together to get the diamond plus finished with 10 minutes to spare! Thanks to Rachel and Jasmine was helping make it a great event for the team!

room_title: Escape room "Queen City Bank Heist" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: We did the Bank Heist and it was awesome! Did another room here before and this was even better! The clues and set up were great and we just enjoyed ourselves. We ended up winning and that was a cherry on top. There isnâ€™t a bad thing I could say about our experience.

room_title: Escape room "Queen City Bank Heist" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: Exit Strategy South with MiMi is the best! We did the bank heist and boy was it a blast. Make sure your team stays calm to read and comprehend all the clues! Thanks fo such a great time.

room_title: Escape room "Queen City Bank Heist" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: We had a great time in "Queen City Bank Heist"! Really fun, the puzzles were interesting and doable but still challenging for the variety of ages we had. Samantha, our room advisor, was lovely, helpful, and very personable, and we had a great experience!

room_title: Escape room "Queen City Bank Heist" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: We just completed and BEAT Bank Heist! We had THE BEST afternoon! It's been hours since we played and we still can't stop talking about it! We cannot wait to come back and play the other rooms and when The Forgotten opens. Your game designer is one talented guy...you have me hooked!
